title: Can't connect to Linux Hyper-V Machines, RDCman works fine
author: davi2td
body_snippet:
VMRDP Connections do not work when connecting to Linux Guest VM's.
Can't connect to Debian 10 , Latest Hyper-v supported version per : [Debian-Supported-Hyper-v](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/virtualization/hyper-v/supported-debian-virtual-machines-on-hyper-v)

## Expected Behavior
Successfully connect to guest Linux OS. 

## Current Behavior
Receive the following generic error when trying to connect to a Linux host:
Protocol Event Disconnected. Host: "localhost"; Proto...

iterations.description: mRemoteNG is unable to connect to Linux Hyper-V VMs via RDP/VM console, while RDCman can, indicating a potential client-side issue or specific configuration mismatch within mRemoteNG.
